problem.markdown:
>>1. Vena contracta is a point where<< ( ) velocity is minimum and static pressure is minimum ( ) Velocity is constant and static pressure is minimum (x) Velocity is maximum and static pressure is minimum
>>2) Generally material used for the orifice plate is<< ( ) Copper (x) Phosphor Bronze ( ) Aluminium
>>3) Beta ratio is defined as<< (x) (Orifice Diameter d)/(Pipe Diameter D) ( ) (Pipe Diameter D ) /(Orifice Diameter d) ( ) (Pipe Diameter D ) / ( Orifice Area a)
>>4) To convert lpm to m3/sec<< ( ) Multiply by 1 ( ) Divide by 1.667 * 10 -5 (x) Multiply by 1.667 * 10 -5
>>5) orifice plate can be of ............. type/types<< ( ) Eccentric ( ) Concentric (x) any one of both
